trends: There have been no other sightings in Haines City
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO shaped like a Hersey Kiss
divs: Sighting DetailsI was headed east on sr544 off of 27 south just outside Haines City Florida at 6:35am on Monday 11-10-08. The sun was just breaking over the horizon when I noticed to the right of the sun an object shaped like a Hersey Kiss, it was gold in color and was about the size of my thumb nail at arms length. I pulled off to the side of the road to observe it better. The color contrasted with the yellow orange fireball of the sun which viewed was about the size of a golf ball at arms lenght. The UFO was moving slowly to the south, after viewing for a moment or two I noticed two silvery objects exit from either side of the craft and flew off quickly to the east until they disappeared. A few moments after this the UFO started to fold in on itself(collaspe upon itself), until it too disappeared. It was a clear morning with very few clouds, but what clouds there were, were at a higher altitude than the UFO or the sun. Having seen UFO's on several ocassions in my life, I've come to take then with a kind of ho-hum attitude. I mean I know they're here, have been here for eons, so it would take something spactacular to really get me excited at this stage in my life.
